quiz.question: ____ again
quiz.explanation: 再次, 再一次。Let me try once again. 让我再试一次。

quiz.question: against __
quiz.explanation: 反对, 反对我们。The other team played well against us. 对方球队对我们打得很好。

quiz.question: __ age
quiz.explanation: 年龄, 在...年龄。He started learning piano at age five. 他五岁开始学钢琴。

quiz.question: ______ agent
quiz.explanation: 代理人, 旅行社。The travel agent helped us book the trip. 旅行社帮我们预订了旅行。

quiz.question: aggressive ________
quiz.explanation: 好斗的, 攻击性行为。Aggressive behavior is not acceptable here. 攻击性行为在这里是不可接受的。

quiz.question: _____ ago
quiz.explanation: 以前, 几年前。I visited this place years ago. 我几年前来过这个地方。

quiz.question: agree ____
quiz.explanation: 同意, 同意。I agree with your suggestion. 我同意你的建议。

quiz.question: _____ agreement
quiz.explanation: 协议, 达成协议。The two sides reach agreement on the contract. 双方就合同达成协议。

quiz.question: _____ aid
quiz.explanation: 援助, 急救。Everyone should learn first aid skills. 每个人都应该学习急救技能。

quiz.question: aim __
quiz.explanation: 瞄准, 瞄准。The campaign will aim at young people. 这个活动将针对年轻人。
